---
title: "Geometric Results Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("rgeom-0.8.RData")
```

2. The queries

```{r}
Geom08Call <- stream_in(file("rgeom-0.8-Call-Revised-0806.jsonl"))
```

3. The Results

```{r}
Geom08Result <- stream_in(file("rgeom-0.8_0806_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
Geom.08.OpenAI <- left_join(Geom08Call,Geom08Result)
Full.Geom.08.0806 <- left_join(Geom08$params, Geom.08.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.Geom.08.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.Geom.08.0806$Outcome <- map_chr(Geom08$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(Geom08Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.Geom.08.0806$Outcome)
```

```{r}
save(Full.Geom.08.0806, file="Full.Geom.08.0806.RData")
```
